hero.caption: Start building with our APIs for absolutely free.

clients.caption: Who we work with
clients.text: Today, millions of people around the world have successfully connected their accounts to apps they love using our API. We provide developers with the tools they need to create easy and accessible experiences for their users.

easyToImplement.caption: Easy to implement
easyToImplement.text: 'Our API comes with just a few lines of code. You will be up and running in no time. We built our documentation page to integrate payments functionality with ease.'

simpleUI.caption: Simple UI & UX
simpleUI.text: Our pre-built form is easy to integrate in your app or website is checkout flow and designed to optimize conversion.

finance.title: Personal Finances
finance.text: Consolidate financial data from multiple sources and categorizetransactions up to 2 years of history. Analyze reports to reconcile activities in your account.

finance.title: Banking & Coverage
finance.text: With our platform, you can speed up account onboarding and support ongoing payments for checking, savings, credit card, and brokerage accounts.

finance.title: Consumer Payments
finance.text: Its easier to set up secure bank payments with us through a flow designed with the user experience in mind. Customers could instantly authenticate their account.
